mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS ROWNO, p.id, p.teamName,p.playerName,p.posi, TO_CHAR(p.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as createdAT FROM player p LEFT OUTER JOIN team t ON p.teamName = t.teamName

SELECT r.id FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS ROWNO, p.id, p.teamName,p.playerName,p.posi, TO_CHAR(p.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as createdAT FROM player p LEFT OUTER JOIN team t ON p.teamName = t.teamName) r WHERE ROWNO=#{rowno}
SELECT playerName FROM player WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE player SET teamName=#{teamName}, playerName=#{playerName}, posi=#{posi} WHERE id=#{id}
